resources.string: Open the app and wait While we getting phone info
After getting info we showcase our available mobile skins
Just select your favourate skins and we deliver at your doorstep
Just select your favourate skins and we deliver at your home

We are using Premium Quality material to make our Mobile Skins.
 Layer Phone Skins gives your phone a premium look and protects your phone from scratches and dust as well. Top Features of Our Mobile Skins
 - Bubble Free Application 
 - Zero Residue Removal 
 - Smudge and Dust Resistance 
 - Supports Wireless Charging 
 - Precisely cut that makes button, speaker, microphone on your phone easily accessible. Edge to Edge and Cut to Cut we make every part visible.
Thank you for placing an order on %s we deliver your order within two days
Please wait while we fetch device information
